== Kozhikode (M Corp. + OG) (803267) ==

Kozhikode (M Corp. + OG) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 124.57 sq. km. and harbouring 120213 households with total population of 550440 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 0 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 425 km. Male population is 262939 and female population is 287501. Scheduled Caste population is 22800 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1259. Census Location Code of the town is 803267<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class I (population_total > 1,00,000).
The civic status of the town is ''.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 0 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 0 km. Railway station is at Kozhikode at a distance of 0 km.
